targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables 
WHERE name = 'funnel_events'
AND database = 'cloud_analytics'
targets.rawQuery: SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables  WHERE name = 'funnel_events' AND database = 'cloud_analytics'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
cohort,
cloud_created "Cloud Created",
concat(CAST(multiIf('$type' = 'real', ba_created/1.0, 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_created/cloud_created*100), 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_ba', ba_created/1.0, 
        round(ba_created/cloud_created*100)
        ), 'String') , if('$type' in ('real', 'pct_to_ba'), '', '%')) "BA Created",   
        
concat(CAST(multiIf('$type' = 'real', ba_first_consumption/1.0, 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_first_consumption/cloud_created*100), 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_first_consumption/ba_created*100), 
        round(ba_first_consumption/ba_created*100)
        ), 'String') , if('$type' = 'real', '', '%')) "First Consumption",  
        
concat(CAST(multiIf('$type' = 'real', ba_consumed_last_7days/1.0, 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_consumed_last_7days/cloud_created*100), 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_consumed_last_7days/ba_created*100), 
        round(ba_consumed_last_7days/ba_first_consumption*100)
        ), 'String') , if('$type' = 'real', '', '%')) "Active Consumption",  
        
concat(CAST(multiIf('$type' = 'real', ba_first_paid_consumption/1.0, 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_first_paid_consumption/cloud_created*100), 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_first_paid_consumption/ba_created*100), 
        round(ba_first_paid_consumption/ba_first_consumption*100)
        ), 'String') , if('$type' = 'real', '', '%')) "First Paid Consumption",  
        
concat(CAST(multiIf('$type' = 'real', ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/1.0, 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/cloud_created*100), 
        '$type' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/ba_created*100), 
        round(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/ba_first_paid_consumption*100)
        ), 'String') , if('$type' = 'real', '', '%')) "Active Paid Consumption"

        


FROM (

SELECT 
CAST($cohort AS String) AS cohort,
sum(cloud_created) as cloud_created,
sum(ba_created) as ba_created,
sum(ba_first_consumption) as ba_first_consumption,
sum(ba_consumed_last_7days) as ba_consumed_last_7days,
sum(ba_first_paid_consumption) as ba_first_paid_consumption,
sum(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days) as ba_consumed_paid_last_7days
FROM cloud_analytics.funnel_grouped
WHERE
  has([$month], month ) = 1
  AND (has([$segment], segment ) = 1 OR has([$segment], 'All') = 1)
  AND (has([$ba_curr_state], ba_curr_state_extended ) = 1 OR has([$ba_curr_state], 'All') = 1)
  AND (has([$channel], channel) = 1 OR has([$channel], 'All') = 1)
  AND (has([$person_type], person_type ) = 1 OR has([$person_type], 'All') = 1)
  AND t = '$t'
GROUP BY $cohort

UNION ALL 

SELECT 
'z.Total' as cohort,
sum(cloud_created) as cloud_created,
sum(ba_created) as ba_created,
sum(ba_first_consumption) as ba_first_consumption,
sum(ba_consumed_last_7days) as ba_consumed_last_7days,
sum(ba_first_paid_consumption) as ba_first_paid_consumption,
sum(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days) as ba_consumed_paid_last_7days
FROM cloud_analytics.funnel_grouped
WHERE
  has([$month], month ) = 1
  AND (has([$segment], segment ) = 1 OR has([$segment], 'All') = 1)
  AND (has([$ba_curr_state], ba_curr_state_extended ) = 1 OR has([$ba_curr_state], 'All') = 1)
  AND (has([$channel], channel) = 1 OR has([$channel], 'All') = 1)
  AND (has([$person_type], person_type ) = 1 OR has([$person_type], 'All') = 1)
  AND t = '$t'

)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  cohort, cloud_created "Cloud Created", concat(CAST(multiIf('real' = 'real', ba_created/1.0,          'real' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_created/cloud_created*100),          'real' = 'pct_to_ba', ba_created/1.0,          round(ba_created/cloud_created*100)         ), 'String') , if('real' in ('real', 'pct_to_ba'), '', '%')) "BA Created",             concat(CAST(multiIf('real' = 'real', ba_first_consumption/1.0,          'real' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_first_consumption/cloud_created*100),          'real' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_first_consumption/ba_created*100),          round(ba_first_consumption/ba_created*100)         ), 'String') , if('real' = 'real', '', '%')) "First Consumption",            concat(CAST(multiIf('real' = 'real', ba_consumed_last_7days/1.0,          'real' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_consumed_last_7days/cloud_created*100),          'real' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_consumed_last_7days/ba_created*100),          round(ba_consumed_last_7days/ba_first_consumption*100)         ), 'String') , if('real' = 'real', '', '%')) "Active Consumption",            concat(CAST(multiIf('real' = 'real', ba_first_paid_consumption/1.0,          'real' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_first_paid_consumption/cloud_created*100),          'real' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_first_paid_consumption/ba_created*100),          round(ba_first_paid_consumption/ba_first_consumption*100)         ), 'String') , if('real' = 'real', '', '%')) "First Paid Consumption",            concat(CAST(multiIf('real' = 'real', ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/1.0,          'real' = 'pct_to_cloud', round(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/cloud_created*100),          'real' = 'pct_to_ba', round(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/ba_created*100),          round(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days/ba_first_paid_consumption*100)         ), 'String') , if('real' = 'real', '', '%')) "Active Paid Consumption"             FROM (  SELECT  CAST(week AS String) AS cohort, sum(cloud_created) as cloud_created, sum(ba_created) as ba_created, sum(ba_first_consumption) as ba_first_consumption, sum(ba_consumed_last_7days) as ba_consumed_last_7days, sum(ba_first_paid_consumption) as ba_first_paid_consumption, sum(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days) as ba_consumed_paid_last_7days FROM cloud_analytics.funnel_grouped WHERE   has(['2019-07','2019-06','2019-05','2019-04','2019-03','2019-02','2019-01','2018-12','2018-11','2018-10','2018-09'], month ) = 1   AND (has(['All'], segment ) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND (has(['All'], ba_curr_state_extended ) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND (has(['All'], channel) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND (has(['All'], person_type ) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND t = '2019-05-13 03:00:00' GROUP BY week  UNION ALL   SELECT  'z.Total' as cohort, sum(cloud_created) as cloud_created, sum(ba_created) as ba_created, sum(ba_first_consumption) as ba_first_consumption, sum(ba_consumed_last_7days) as ba_consumed_last_7days, sum(ba_first_paid_consumption) as ba_first_paid_consumption, sum(ba_consumed_paid_last_7days) as ba_consumed_paid_last_7days FROM cloud_analytics.funnel_grouped WHERE   has(['2019-07','2019-06','2019-05','2019-04','2019-03','2019-02','2019-01','2018-12','2018-11','2018-10','2018-09'], month ) = 1   AND (has(['All'], segment ) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND (has(['All'], ba_curr_state_extended ) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND (has(['All'], channel) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND (has(['All'], person_type ) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1)   AND t = '2019-05-13 03:00:00'  )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT month from cloud_analytics.funnel_events WHERE month != ''
list.name: month
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT month from cloud_analytics.funnel_events WHERE month != ''
